seo.title: About SustainSage | Bilingual coaching grounded in ethics
seo.description: Meet the bilingual coaches behind SustainSage, the transitions we support, and the boundaries that keep every partnership safe.

intro.title: Coaching for complex transitions
intro.body: SustainSage is led by bilingual coaches who have moved between Taiwan, Singapore, and the UK. We keep coaching steady, culturally aware, and grounded in practical experiments.

key_points.title: What guides our coaching
items: ICF-aligned practice keeps agreements, data care, and supervision transparent.
Lived experience across Asia-Pacific and the UK keeps culture and policy context in view.
No-drama experiments help you build momentum without burning out.

process.title: How partnerships unfold
process.description: Every engagement starts with context, informed consent, and clarity on how we will work together.

steps.title: Set shared agreements
steps.description: We confirm goals, roles, confidentiality boundaries, cadence, and data retention before sessions begin.

steps.title: Work bilingually
steps.description: Coaching flows between English, Traditional Chinese, and Simplified Chinese so nuance stays intact.

steps.title: Reflect and adapt
steps.description: Monthly supervision and reflective practice help us surface blind spots and adjust support early.

whatIsCoaching.title: What coaching looks like with SustainSage
whatIsCoaching.description: Coaching is a structured, future-focused partnership where you stay in charge of direction and pace.

scenarios.title: You are translating a new leadership role across cultures
scenarios.description: We clarify authority, decision rights, and relationship boundaries so you can lead confidently without erasing your own context.

scenarios.title: You want accountability for change experiments
scenarios.description: Sessions map experiments, data care, and check-ins so shifts stay measurable, ethical, and sustainable.

scenarios.title: You need space to process complex stakeholder dynamics
scenarios.description: We explore assumptions, power, and accessibility considerations, then co-design language you can bring back to the team.

whatIsCoaching.disclaimer: Coaching does not replace therapy, legal advice, or crisis response. We will pause and refer when specialised care is required.

boundaries.title: Boundaries we uphold
boundaries.description: These commitments protect your agency, safety, and consent.

items.question: What scope does coaching cover?
items.answer: We stay future-focused and collaborative. When therapeutic or legal support is needed, we pause and signpost trusted professionals.

items.question: How do you monitor ethics?
items.answer: We follow the International Coaching Federation Code of Ethics and maintain supervision to stay accountable.

items.question: What if accessibility needs change?
items.answer: We revisit agreements every few sessions to check progress, accessibility, and safeguarding requirements.

callout.title: Ready to map your next step?
callout.body: Browse our coaching services or read the full coaching boundaries we uphold.
